SUBJECT:   Good day to you,
  Good day to you,
Have you received my proposal? Are you willing and ready to work with me? Please confirm your readiness if you are willing and ready to work with me to enable me to let you in on the next line of action.
I wait for your earliest response.
Best Regards,
John Marshall Bill   
From: j*****************2@gmail.com
To: cv20810@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-20 05:48:19
SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
Dear ,
I apologize if this email infringes on your privacy, as I did not have the
opportunity to acquaint myself with your mindset before making this offer.
However, please be assured that this email is genuine and confidential, as
I am a friend in dire need of your assistance.
My name is John Marshall Bill, a retired military personnel. I have friends
in Ukraine with whom I worked in the past. They own private gas production
companies in Ukraine, which were not aligned with the government before the
crisis broke out in the country. They currently have shipments of funds in
their possession, which cannot be stored in a firm or transferred via
bank-to-bank transfer due to the current circumstances. As a result, they
require my help to move the attached shipments out of Ukraine for
safekeeping and security reasons.
I intend to assist them in moving the funds safely out of Ukraine with the
help of my contact in NATO. However, I require a trustworthy receiver who
can stand as the beneficiary of the shipment upon delivery. It has been
agreed that my friends will receive 40% of the funds, I will receive 30%,
and you will receive 30%, as I believe this is fair.
Please note that this project requires utmost trust and dedication from
you. Rest assured that there is no risk attached to this project as I can
guarantee a 100% risk-free project, and I will guide you carefully to
success. After a safe delivery of the shipment, a representative from my
friends will meet with you in your country for further discussion on
disbursement and investment purposes.
If you are interested in this offer, kindly provide the following
information as required:
Full name
Full contact address
Direct mobile number
Any government-issued identity that will allow my friends' representative
to identify you upon their arrival.
Once I receive your information, I will provide you with further details.
Thank you for your time.
Best regards,
John Marshall Bill
From: j*****************2@gmail.com
To: cv20810@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-20 07:40:21
SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
Dear Agnes,
What I need is a receiver/Beneficiary that would enable my associates to
approve the dispatch of just one shipment  as I can assure you that no harm
or risk will come to you.

entitled to 30% and i will be entitled to 30% as well from the total

I hope this email finds you well.
Regards,
Rtd Col John Marshall Bill

Dear Agnes,
As I mentioned in my previous message, there are shipments of cash that can

safely, provided that you meet the delivery requirements.
Please note that my partners have taken care of the bills and charges for
the release of the shipments, so you do not need to worry about them.
However, the agent from the delivery company will not know the true content
of the shipments and it is essential that you do not disclose it to them.
It is your responsibility as the beneficiary to ensure that the customs
duty, VAT, and handling charges are sorted out in your country to avoid the
shipment being processed by your airport
authorities. These are the guidelines given to us by the company and it is
crucial that you follow them. If you cannot handle your part of the project
in your country,nothing can be done on my part as my partners will not
grant approval for the release of the shipments for dispatch when the part
of the beneficiary/receiver is not guaranteed, unless the delivery company
confirms that the beneficiary/receiver can meet their delivery requirement
when they arrive in their country.
Please note that this project requires utmost trust and dedication from
you. After the safe delivery of the shipment, a representative from my
partners will meet with you in your country for further discussion on
disbursement and investment purposes.
I hope this email finds you well.
Best Regards,
Retired Colonel John Marshall Bill

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear ,
I apologize if this email infringes on your privacy, as I did not have the
opportunity to acquaint myself with your mindset before making this offer.
However, please be assured that this email is genuine and confidential, as
I am a friend in dire need of your assistance.
My name is John Marshall Bill, a retired military personnel. I have friends
in Ukraine with whom I worked in the past. They own private gas production
companies in Ukraine, which were not aligned with the government before the
crisis broke out in the country. They currently have shipments of funds in
their possession, which cannot be stored in a firm or transferred via
bank-to-bank transfer due to the current circumstances. As a result, they
require my help to move the attached shipments out of Ukraine for
safekeeping and security reasons.
I intend to assist them in moving the funds safely out of Ukraine with the
help of my contact in NATO. However, I require a trustworthy receiver who
can stand as the beneficiary of the shipment upon delivery. It has been
agreed that my friends will receive 40% of the funds, I will receive 30%,
and you will receive 30%, as I believe this is fair.
Please note that this project requires utmost trust and dedication from
you. Rest assured that there is no risk attached to this project as I can
guarantee a 100% risk-free project, and I will guide you carefully to
success. After a safe delivery of the shipment, a representative from my
friends will meet with you in your country for further discussion on
disbursement and investment purposes.
If you are interested in this offer, kindly provide the following
information as required:
Full name
Full contact address
Direct mobile number
Any government-issued identity that will allow my friends' representative
to identify you upon their arrival.
Once I receive your information, I will provide you with further details.
Thank you for your time.
Best regards,
John Marshall Bill

conversations.body:

What I need is a receiver/Beneficiary that would enable my associates to
approve the dispatch of just one shipment  as I can assure you that no harm
or risk will come to you.

conversations.body:
Dear Rtd Col John Marshall Bill,
Thank you for your email. I am sorry, but I am not sure what shipment you are referring to. Could you please provide me with more details about the shipment and the company you are referring to? Once I have more information, I will be able to assist you better.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
The company I am referring to is the delivery company that will be
delivering the attached shipment to your doorstep when you and them have
reached an agreement.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Thank you for your email. I understand that the attached shipment will be delivered to my doorstep once an agreement has been reached with the delivery company. Could you please provide me with more information about the shipment, such as its contents and expected delivery date? 
Thank you.
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Thanks for your earliest response.
The content of the shipment is 2Million in cash knowing to my associates
you and my humble self, while knowing to the agent coming to deliver to
your doorstep is that the content of the shipment is valued at $2Million
USD as under no circumstances must you disclose it to him.
The expected date will be given to you being the beneficiary as that will
be agreed upon between you and the delivery company when you contact them
in following the instructions on my two(2) previous emails.
I hope this email finds you well.
Regards,
JMB

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear JMB,
I'm sorry, but I'm not sure what you are referring to. I have no knowledge of any shipment or delivery company. Could you please provide more information so I can better understand what you are talking about?
Thank you.
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Hello Agnes,
The next line of action is to contact the company requested for the release
of your shipment.
Contact the company in the below manner.
I am Mr/Mrs......................................from...Full contact
address.............i am the beneficiary to the shipment lodged with your
company by Rtd Col John Marshall Bill and Mrs Patricia Horoho.
Kindly give me more details on how I can retrieve my shipment.
See contact details below
https://www.seckglobal.com
Email: Info@seckglobal.com
Email:seckglobal.company@gmail.com
Tel:+447452177132
    +137254999061
    +971551672915
Do endeavor to keep me informed correctly in your dealings with the company
as well.
Regards,
JMB

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear JMB,
Thank you for your email. Can you please provide me with the name of the company that I need to contact for the release of the shipment? Also, do you have any additional information about the shipment that you can share with me? This will help me to better understand the situation and assist you in retrieving your shipment.
Looking forward to hearing back from you.
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear Agnes,
Did you received my previous email?Because if you did the name and contact
information of the company and their contact address was in that email.
The delivery company will guide you correctly as I can guarantee that there
will definitely be no risk attached in as long as you follow the
instructions and directives of the delivery company correctly.
I wait to hear from you as soon as possible.
Regards,
JMB

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear JMB,
I'm sorry, but I'm not sure what you are referring to. I don't recall receiving any previous email from you with information about a delivery company. Could you please provide me with more details so that I can better understand what you are talking about?
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear JMB,
Thank you for your email. However, I am not sure what shipment you are referring to and what company I am supposed to contact. Can you please provide me with more details about the shipment and the company? Once I have more information, I will be able to assist you better.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear Agnes,
Happy New Month to you
You have still not made contact with the delivery company why?

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
I'm sorry, but I believe you have sent this message to the wrong person. I have no knowledge of any delivery company or any previous communication with you. Please check your records and ensure that you have contacted the correct person.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
This is the 26th email messages we have both exchanged so do not understand
the meaning of this message you just sent to me.
Best regards,
John Marshall Bill

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear John Marshall Bill,
I apologize for any confusion caused by my previous message. It was likely a mistake or an error on my part. Please disregard it and let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Hello Agnes,
Top of the day to you.
Have you made contact with the delivery company yet?
I wait to hear from you.
Regards,
John Marshall Bill

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear John Marshall Bill,
Thank you for your email. I apologize for the delay in my response. I have not yet made contact with the delivery company, but I will do so as soon as possible and keep you updated on any progress.
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear Agnes,
Thanks for your earliest response.
Please do and keep me informed correctly as time is of the essence to us in
achieving this once in a lifetime opportunity.
I hope this email finds you well.
Regards,
John Marshall Bill

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear John Marshall Bill,
Thank you for your email. I would be happy to assist you with whatever you need, but I'm afraid I'm not sure what you are referring to. Could you please provide me with more information about the matter at hand so that I can better understand how to help you?
Thank you and have a great day.
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Like I mentioned previously that my associates wants to assist me with some
funds as an empowerment, what I need is a trustworthy and a reliable
receiver that could help me retrieve the shipment where I shall join you
for disbursement and investment purposes.
What I need is for you to contact the delivery company in following the
instructions on the email I sent to you and also endeavor to follow the
instructions of the delivery company correctly and success is achieved
without any risk or mishaps .
I hope this email finds you well.
Regards,
John Marshall Bill

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear John Marshall Bill,
Thank you for your email. I am sorry, but I am not sure I understand what you are asking me to do. Could you please provide me with more information about the shipment and the delivery company? I would need to know more before I can assist you.
Thank you.
Best wishes,
Agnes

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Please read my previous emails carefully as i am quite sure you will
understand

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Good day to you,
conversations.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
I apologize if my previous email did not address your concerns adequately. I will review your previous emails carefully to ensure that I understand your requirements and respond appropriately.
Thank you for your patience.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Agnes
